sentence: Her outfit was so bizarre that it turned heads everywhere.

definition: treating serious issues with deliberately inappropriate humor
sentence: His facetious remarks were not taken well during the meeting.

definition: the fact of two things being seen or placed close together for contrasting effect
sentence: The juxtaposition of the bright colors against the muted background was striking.

definition: the occurrence of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
sentence: Finding the old photograph was a moment of pure serendipity.
He gave her a quizzical look when she told her story.

definition: relating to or concerned with the art of rhetoric
sentence: His rhetorical questions left the audience pondering.

definition: a person who acts obsequiously toward someone important in order to gain advantage
sentence: The sycophant flattered the boss to secure a promotion.

definition: beyond or above the range of normal or merely physical human experience
sentence: The artist's work was celebrated for its transcendent beauty.

definition: incapable of being fully explored or understood
sentence: The depths of the ocean remain largely unfathomable.

definition: the scientific study of the behavior, structure, physiology, classification, and distribution of animals
sentence: She decided to major in zoology to pursue her love for animals.
